name: part_011
file: tmp_【HOPE TO THE FUTURE 3D LIVE】 IRyS 2024 Birthday Live! #IRySBDay [cc5SQqswwMM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_011.mov

scenes.description: IRyS performs 'Anatato Watashino' on stage, often seen inside a large bubble effect.
Scene transition to a virtual flower field. IRyS addresses the audience, acknowledging the encore calls and sharing information about merchandise and membership content.
IRyS performs 'Garnet' in the virtual flower field.

subtitles.original: ゆだねる事に臆病になる
subtitles.english: Becoming afraid of surrendering

subtitles.original: 訪れる長い時 待っていた
subtitles.english: I was waiting for the long time to come

subtitles.original: 微笑んで支えになりましょう
subtitles.english: Let's smile and be a support

subtitles.original: 孤独で空に願うのなら
subtitles.english: If you wish upon the sky in solitude

subtitles.original: いつか繰り返す命の出口
subtitles.english: The exit of life that repeats one day

subtitles.original: さらにその先の道も
subtitles.english: And the road even further beyond that

subtitles.original: きっと出会えると信じて今を
subtitles.english: Believing we'll surely meet, I'll face the present

subtitles.original: おやすみなさい
subtitles.english: Goodnight

subtitles.original: 赤い血潮が渦巻く波間
subtitles.english: Between the waves where red blood swirls

subtitles.original: 寄せては返す営み
subtitles.english: The cycle of coming and going

subtitles.original: 愛し 愛され 一つになるまで
subtitles.english: Until we love and are loved as one

subtitles.original: おやすみなさい
subtitles.english: Goodnight

subtitles.original: 時は満ちるから
subtitles.english: Because time will be fulfilled

subtitles.original: 長い時 離れても
subtitles.english: Even if we're apart for a long time

subtitles.original: 知っている 必ず呼び合う
subtitles.english: I know we'll surely call out to each other

subtitles.original: 絆を運命と呼ぶ事
subtitles.english: Calling our bond destiny

subtitles.original: 抱いて 抱きしめても抜け出せない
subtitles.english: Even if I hold you and embrace you, I can't escape

subtitles.original: 定められた境から
subtitles.english: From the fixed boundary

subtitles.original: 溶けてなくなるほどの進化へと
subtitles.english: Toward an evolution that melts away

subtitles.original: おかえりなさい
subtitles.english: Welcome home

subtitles.original: 白い結晶が降り注ぐ街
subtitles.english: The town where white crystals pour down

subtitles.original: 全ては包まれるだけ
subtitles.english: Everything is simply enveloped

subtitles.original: 誰が決めた訳でもない夢
subtitles.english: A dream that no one decided on

subtitles.original: おかえりなさい
subtitles.english: Welcome home

subtitles.original: 心のままに
subtitles.english: As your heart desires

subtitles.original: Encore! Encore!
subtitles.english: Encore! Encore!

subtitles.original: Encore! Encore!
subtitles.english: Encore! Encore!

subtitles.original: Eh? I just used up all my energy and broke into pieces, though.
subtitles.english: Eh? I just used up all my energy and broke into pieces, though.

subtitles.original: どうしようかな？
subtitles.english: What should I do?

subtitles.original: しゃあないな...
subtitles.english: Can't be helped...

subtitles.original: I'll sing one last song for you guys.
subtitles.english: I'll sing one last song for you guys.

subtitles.original: Oh, and merch sales start at 10:05
subtitles.english: Oh, and merch sales start at 10:05

subtitles.original: and my membership-only part will start at 10:15. So don't miss it!
subtitles.english: and my membership-only part will start at 10:15. So don't miss it!

subtitles.original: Now please listen to my last song for the stream, Garnet.
subtitles.english: Now please listen to my last song for the stream, Garnet.

subtitles.original: グラウンド駆けてくあなたの背中は
subtitles.english: Your back as you run across the ground

subtitles.original: 空に浮かんだ雲よりも自由で
subtitles.english: Is freer than the clouds floating in the sky

subtitles.original: ノートに並んだ四角い文字さえ
subtitles.english: Even the square characters lined up in my notebook

subtitles.original: すべてを照らす光に見えた
subtitles.english: Looked like light illuminating everything

subtitles.original: 好きという気持ちが分からなくて
subtitles.english: Not understanding what it felt like to love

subtitles.original: 二度とは戻らないこの時間が
subtitles.english: This time that will never return

subtitles.original: その意味をあたしに教えてくれた
subtitles.english: Taught me its meaning

subtitles.original: あなたと過ごした日々をこの胸に焼き付けよう
subtitles.english: I'll sear the days spent with you into my heart

subtitles.original: 思い出さなくても大丈夫なように
subtitles.english: So that it's okay even if I don't remember them

subtitles.original: いつか他の誰かを好きになったとしても
subtitles.english: Even if I fall in love with someone else someday
